description: go spec: remove notes about gccgo limitations, now fixed

messages.text:
Hello gri (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM - gri On Thu, Sep 29, 2011 at 1:28 PM, wrote: > Reviewers: gri, > > Message: > Hello gri (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com), > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ > > > Description: > go spec: remove notes about gccgo limitations, now fixed > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5164041/ > > Affected files: >  M doc/go_spec.html > > > Index: doc/go_spec.html > =================================================================== > --- a/doc/go_spec.html > +++ b/doc/go_spec.html > @@ -5265,7 +5265,5 @@ >  

Implementation differences - TODO

>  
    >        
  • len(a) is only a constant if a is a > (qualified) identifier denoting an array or pointer to an array.
    • > -      
  • In gccgo, nil maps are not treated like empty > maps.
    • > -      
  • In gccgo, trying to send/receive from a nil channel > causes a run-time panic.
    • >  
>   > > >

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=27bcd924a96d ***

go spec: remove notes about gccgo limitations, now fixed

R=gri
CC=golang-dev
